name: Abyssal Blade
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

descriptions.name: Overwhelm
descriptions.description: Stuns a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

descriptions.name: Bash
descriptions.description: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

descriptions.name: Damage Block
descriptions.description: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
